A young girl discovers that she has the ability to communicate with birds, and uses her powers to solve mysteries and help those in need.
A group of bird-like creatures come to Earth and teach a young girl the secrets of their language and way of life, and she must use her newfound knowledge to protect their world from danger.
A girl who can speak with birds is tasked with saving her town from a group of evil bird-like creatures that have invaded and are wreaking havoc.
A young girl discovers that she has the ability to communicate with birds and uses her powers to uncover a conspiracy involving the exploitation of bird habitats for profit.

A girl who can speak with birds must navigate a dangerous journey through the forest to save her family and friends from a group of evil creatures that are using their powers to control the minds of animals.
